name: Octoo - Multimedia API
short_description: Octoo is a multimedia API. The aim of Octoo is to create a standard multimedia environment for developers on Unix/Linux platforms. Octoo can be used to implement graphical user interfaces, 2D/3D graphics, audio, input devices and network communication.
